Analysis of Gapminder dataset with R.

Aim of project: To explore gaminder dataset and find patterns and relationships between the variables in the dataset. 

1. Find the population overtime for different continents.
2. check the relationship between lifeExp and pop.
3. check the relationship between gdppercap and pop.
4. Evaluate trend of lifeExp growth over a period of time.
5. Evaluate trend in gdp growth ver time
6. Make a visually sophiscated plots for countries(6) with highest life expectancy and countries(6) with lowest life expectancy.
